-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | A Minimal JSON Parser & Printer for Haskell
--   
@package yocto
@version 0.1.2

module Text.JSON.Yocto
data Value
Null :: Value
Boolean :: Bool -> Value
Number :: Rational -> Value
String :: String -> Value
Array :: [Value] -> Value
Object :: (Map String Value) -> Value
instance Eq Value
instance Ord Value
instance Read Value
instance Show Value
